title: ERNET Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Project Engineer Posts
description: The Education and Research Network India (ERNET) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech in Electronics Engineering, MCA, and M.Sc. can apply for the ERNET Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details,...
